WorkItem.ClosedComment: Issues remarked in last comment or moved to new (separated) issues
WorkItem.Description:
Not sure if these should be separate tickets, as it only relates to the beta release of the Mac-compatible web-based version
 
1. The Gemming Template has no tooltips showing for me, and no instructions on how to use it, nor is it very intuitive.
2. Talent names not in mouseover tooltip - would help a fair amount, especially newer people.
3. Survival Instincts icon wrong - 3rd row down in Feral talent tree.
4. Load From Armory would ideally immediately move the text input cursor to the 'Name' block of the pop-up.
5. Load From Armory could use a drop-down of server names.
6. Mouse scroll button would be useful to scroll up & down in the right-hand pane listing gear/talents etc.
7. Enforce Gem Requirements has an asterisk by it but no tooltip.
 
Default Cat Spec not optimized for single-target dps. I suggest you see FBN spec at
http://talent.mmo-champion.com/?druid#-mPapt0zGRQT46,,9704
or
Cat DPS Guide For Dummies'
http://www.wowhead.com/?talent#0ZEMMsfrz0eo0huAkbAczb:VpmVzc
 
My specs:
2.8GHz iMac
4GB RAM
Mac OS X 10.6.1
Firefox browser (but using the 'Install Offline' version - seems to work fine and is perfectly stable).
Have only used the Feral Cat models so far if that makes any difference.
 
If someone could enlighten me as to how these issues should have been posted I'd much appreciate it.

Comments.Message:
I'll be doing a full pass of the UI before launch, and these little things give me a good place to start, thanks.

Default cat spec is intended the way it is, since that's the spec that 95% of users should be using for their Cat.

1. Duplicate: http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/18111 : Fixed in commit 51733
2. Fixed in commit 51734
3. That's odd, it has the correct icon label in it. Migrated to new issue: http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/18130
4. It's starting on the region for now, may look at changing this later
5. This has been added (a while ago)
6. Duplicate: http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/14296
7. Fixed in commit 51735
